name: Definitely Not Pong
description:
Synopsis:  Just a game, and it's not Pong.  Try not to lose the ball, or get hit by the bad ones.  Not quite a bullethell, but maybe more like a difficult scoring mechanic.

Repository:  If you're interested in the code, it's pretty bad.  I almost made the repo public so that people can learn from my mistakes, but I realize I don't really have permission to do that.

Game Jam Info:  Made for Weekly Game Jam 50; "Remake a Classic"

Credits:KnivesGame Designer / ProgrammerOscar OrozcoMusic ComposerScowshSound Effects
